Text.val: 27.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended TINM_INVOICENO to alpha 20 (screen)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Debtor number client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor number Comfin')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor name')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Currency')&';'&MlsTrans ('Due date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Comfin/Client')
